title: Resources & Services | Wellness Center | University of Illinois at Chicago

Wellness Center     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Wellness Center      Wellness Center   Main Menu    About Us           Need Help?    FAQs    Contact         News & Events           Calendar of Events    Annual Events    Past Events         Resources & Services           Pop-Up Pantry    Individual Consultations    Homeless Assistance    Wellness Supplies    Stress Relief Place    Sexual Health/ Healthy Relationships    Literature Library & Videos    Alcohol & e-CHUG    Studying    Conflict Management    Sleep         Workshops           Workshops Offered    Request a Workshop         Policies           Alcohol and Other Drug    Smoke Free Campus Policy and Fine Payment    Student Disciplinary Policy    Cannabis Policy          Eyebrow menu    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                              Wellness Center       Resources & Services      View Menu            Resources & Services  Explore all of the resources available to you on our online space as well as at the Wellness Center! We are here to support and help you!       Pop-Up Pantry      Are you a student experiencing food insecurity? Are you a community member looking to support the pantry through donation of goods or time? If you answered yes, to either of these questions, then the Pop-Up Pantry is for you! Learn how to shop, donate, volunteer, and more!    Pop-Up Pantry         Individual Consultations      If you need guidance in any area of wellness, then an individual consultation may be just the guidance you need! Submit a form and you will be contacted by a health educator to set up your appointment!    Individual Consulations         Homeless Assistance      Do you find yourself couch surfing? Or not knowing where you are going to sleep from night to night? If you are a student experiencing housing instability, check out UIC and community resources available to you.    Homeless Assistance         Wellness Supplies      If you are in need of a band-aide, hand sanitizer, tissues, or sexual health resources, stop by for these free items!    Wellness Supplies         Stress Relief Place      Have stress in your life? If so, this place is for you! Explore the stress relief guides, videos, and guided imagery to help you relax and combat your stress!    Stress Relief Place         Sexual Health      Sexual health can be a tricky topic but most importantly, if you choose to engage in sexual activity, we want you to be safe! Learn about safe sex practices and get all of your questions answered here!    Sexual Health         Literature & Video Library      The Wellness Center both physically and online is filled with literature resources to answer questions you may have that address the 8 dimensions of wellness. Browse in our online literature library or stop in!    Literature Library & Videos         Studying      Do you feel like you study hard but get to the test and realize you didn’t study enough?  Check out the videos to help explore learning styles that will help you pinpoint which way is the best way for you to study.    Studying Tips         Sleep      Do college students even sleep? Come explore and check out videos that highlight the importance of sleep as well as tips to help you sleep!    Sleep         Conflict Management      Conflict, a natural part of life, can occur at any time and in any professional or personal relationship.  Successfully managing a conflict starts with understanding how you react in these tense situations.  To learn more about how to properly resolve conflict come check out these video links!
